de.mnl.osgi.lf4osgi.core

Interface LoggerFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLoggerFacade, Lf4OsgiLogger

    public interface LoggerFacade
    The interface that must be implemented by logger facades.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loggerFactoryUpdated(LoggerFactory factory)
      Called when the logger factory changes.

    • Method Detail

      • loggerFactoryUpdated

        void loggerFactoryUpdated(LoggerFactory factory)
        Called when the logger factory changes. Implementing classes must update the logger that they forward to.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory
